## OWebRouter.on() method

Attach a route action.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(path: ORoutePath, rules: ORoutePathOptions | undefined, action: ORouteAction): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  path | ORoutePath | the path to watch |
|  rules | ORoutePathOptions \| undefined | the path rules |
|  action | ORouteAction | the action to run |

<b>Returns:</b>

this
